verses.verse: The words<WH1697> of Jeremiah<WH3414> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518> of the priests<WH3548> that were in Anathoth<WH6068> in the land<WH776> of Benjamin:<WH1144>

To whom<WH834> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> in the days<WH3117> of Josiah<WH2977> the son<WH1121> of Amon<WH526> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> in the thirteenth<WH7969> <WH6240> year<WH8141> of his reign.<WH4427>

It came<WH1961> also in the days<WH3117> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> to the end<WH8537> of the eleventh<WH6240> year<WH8141> of Zedekiah<WH6667> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> to the carrying<WH1540> away of Jerusalem<WH3389> captive<WH1540> in the fifth<WH2549> month.<WH2320>
Then the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Before<WH2962> I formed<WH3335> you in the belly<WH990> I knew<WH3045> you; and before<WH2962> you came<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of the womb<WH7358> I sanctified<WH6942> you, and I ordained<WH5414> you a prophet<WH5030> to the nations.<WH1471>
Then said<WH559> I, Ah,<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> behold,<WH2009> I cannot<WH3808> speak:<WH1696> for I am a child.<WH5288>

But the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Say<WH559> not, I am a child:<WH5288> for you shall go<WH3212> to all<WH3605> that I shall send<WH7971> you, and whatever<WH3605> <WH834> I command<WH6680> you you shall speak.<WH1696>
Be not afraid<WH3372> of their faces:<WH6440> for I am with you to deliver<WH5337> you, said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

Then the LORD<WH3068> put<WH7971> forth<WH7971> his hand,<WH3027> and touched<WH5060> my mouth.<WH6310> And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Behold,<WH2009> I have put<WH5414> my words<WH1697> in your mouth.<WH6310>

See,<WH7200> I have this<WH2088> day<WH3117> set<WH6485> you over<WH5921> the nations<WH1471> and over<WH5921> the kingdoms,<WH4467> to root<WH5428> out, and to pull<WH5422> down, and to destroy,<WH6> and to throw<WH2040> down,<WH2040> to build,<WH1129> and to plant.<WH5193>

Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559> Jeremiah,<WH3414> what<WH4100> see<WH7200> you? And I said,<WH559> I see<WH7200> a rod<WH4731> of an almond<WH8247> tree.
Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to me, You have well<WH3190> seen:<WH7200> for I will hasten<WH8245> my word<WH1697> to perform<WH6213> it.

And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me the second<WH8145> time, saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> see<WH7200> you? And I said,<WH559> I see<WH7200> a seething<WH5301> pot;<WH5518> and the face<WH6440> thereof is toward<WH6440> the north.<WH6828>
Then the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Out of the north<WH6828> an evil<WH7451> shall break<WH6605> forth on all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land.<WH776>

For, see,<WH2009> I will call<WH7121> all<WH3605> the families<WH4940> of the kingdoms<WH4467> of the north,<WH6828> said<WH5002> the LORD;<WH3068> and they shall come,<WH935> and they shall set<WH5414> every<WH376> one<WH376> his throne<WH3678> at the entering<WH6607> of the gates<WH8179> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and against<WH5921> all<WH3605> the walls<WH2346> thereof round<WH5439> about, and against<WH5921> all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of Judah.<WH3063>

And I will utter<WH1696> my judgments<WH4941> against<WH5921> them touching<WH5921> all<WH3605> their wickedness,<WH7451> who have forsaken<WH5800> me, and have burned<WH6999> incense<WH6999> to other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and worshipped<WH7812> the works<WH4639> of their own hands.<WH3027>

You therefore gird<WH2296> up your loins,<WH4975> and arise,<WH6965> and speak<WH1696> to them all<WH3605> that I command<WH6680> you: be not dismayed<WH2865> at their faces,<WH6440> lest<WH6435> I confound<WH2865> you before<WH6440> them.

For, behold,<WH2009> I have made<WH5414> you this day<WH3117> a defended<WH4013> city,<WH5892> and an iron<WH1270> pillar,<WH5982> and brazen<WH5178> walls<WH2346> against<WH5921> the whole<WH3605> land,<WH776> against the kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> against the princes<WH8269> thereof, against the priests<WH3548> thereof, and against the people<WH5971> of the land.<WH776>
And they shall fight<WH3898> against<WH413> you; but they shall not prevail<WH3201> against you; for I am with you, said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> to deliver<WH5337> you.
